channel.title: Does this even make sense?
channel.description:
I'm not sure if this is really the right place to put this but I figure it's something to discuss so w/e lol. Ok so pure2ownage, krackkid, and chaos. The 3 ppl noone really seem to like here from what I've seen and the whole apolagy thing. How come all of them have 200 rep? Whatsup with that?
Also on another note this may be a stupid question (plz don't hate for me asking) but what exactly would you guys define as a troll?
Edit: I'm sorry I'm posting so many topics in the General Discussion section. This is the last one till all mine are off the front page =p. I don't wanna be a spammer.

item.title: Does this even make sense?
item.dc:creator: @orcashark orcashark
item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

Newty:

I should reset everyone’s rep in here for talking about rep…

Well he was looking for an answer and im just trying to be helpful… :S

Read full topic

item.title: Does this even make sense?
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“n10si t, post:24, topic:356537”][quote author=orcashark link=topic=453070.msg3319827#msg3319827 date=1282607944]

But isn’t that a troll?

Eh, not really. You can’t really be a troll when your basically only messing with people 15 and younger.

Well, in my opinion, if your 18+ and still hanging around the internet, you need to get off your ass and do something with your life.

Mopar is 25 but ill bet that doesnt abide to him now does it?

They may be Trolls/Spammers Ex-Trolls/Spammers, but when they were they were still helpful. So that explains why they have 200 rep. And people keep repping them sucking up hoping they will rep them back.
[/quote]

Well, this is what he does. He has a Bachelor’s degree in computer science, so him being on the internet alot is cool, considering his occupation.[/quote]Nearly everyone on here that is 17+ isn’t retarded, so I’d take back your comment if I were you. They’re the members out of anyone that should be the ones allowed on here.

Read full topic

item.title: Does this even make sense?
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:16, topic:356537”][quote author=Cowarooroo link=topic=453070.msg3319688#msg3319688 date=1282602937]

Shut up shut up shut up. They get their rep because people acknowledge them as you are by making a whole thread for them. Rep is a number that represents how much of a socialistic piece of garbage you are, in addition to you see how many posts you can put on this site by the end of the night.

i rep krack whenever he loses cause hes cool when u get to know him and hes only a dumbass for fun just like every1 is sometimes
[/quote]That’s retarded.

Are you one of the serious mods on this site (the only one)? Because I’ve always wanted to know if we had one :eek:.

Before moderation, I thought ReaperX was pretty chill and liked to have fun. Outside of mopar, it is probably that way. Since his promotion, I believe he needs to put serious mode on (with an occasion of humor).[/quote]I don’t try to be an asshole, but it’s hard not to when half of the members morality is equal to or less than the value of a quarter. I do joke when I can, but there has to be a line drawn somewhere.

Read full topic
